Element.name: IntermediateThrowingEvent
Element.Description: A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/Events/PlainEvents/IntermediateThrowingEvent"/> is used for modeling methodologies that use Events to indicate some change of state in the Process.
Element.Action: Convert this event into a different catching event.
Convert this event into a different throwing event.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property:
The behaviour of the event at execution time. Possible values are:
  • Service: the process is affected by some change of state which could be delivered to a Web service or an automated application.
  • Manual: the process is affected by some change of state which is of no interest for any business process execution engine.
